catalog.title: catalog
catalog.description: This property refers to a catalog whose contents are of interest in the context of this catalog.

contactPoint.title: contact point
contactPoint.description: This property contains contact information that can be used for sending comments about the Catalogue.

dataset.title: dataset
dataset.description: This property links the Catalog with the Dataset(s) that is/are part of the Catalog.

keyword.title: keyword/tag
keyword.description: A keyword or tag describing the resource.

keywordMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

record.title: catalog record
record.description: A record describing the registration of a single resource (e.g., a dataset, a data service) that is part of the catalog.

service.title: service
service.description: This property refers to a site or end-point (Data Service) that is listed in the Catalog.

theme.title: theme/category
theme.description: This property refers to a category of the Catalog. A Catalog may be associated with multiple themes.

themeTaxonomy.title: themes
themeTaxonomy.description: A knowledge organization system (KOS) used to classify the resources documented in the catalog (e.g., datasets and services).

accessRights.title: access rights
accessRights.description: This property refers to information that indicates whether the Catalog is open data, has access restrictions or is not public.

conformsTo.title: schema version
conformsTo.description: An established standard to which the described catalog conforms.

creator.title: creator
creator.description: The entity responsible for creating the resource.

description.title: description
description.description: Free-text description of the catalog (in the language indicated in the attribute).

descriptionMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

hasPart.title: has part
hasPart.description: This property refers to a related catalog that is part of the described catalog.

identifier.title: identifier
identifier.description: This property contains the main identifier for the Catalog, e.g. the URI or other unique identifier.

issued.title: release date
issued.description: Date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the resource.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

language.title: language
language.description: This property refers to a language used in the textual metadata describing titles, descriptions, etc. of the Datasets in the Catalog.

license.title: license
license.description: This property refers to the license under which the Catalog can be used or reused.

modified.title: update/modification date
modified.description: Most recent date on which the resource was changed, updated or modified.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

publisher.title: publisher
publisher.description: Entity responsible for making the catalog available.

rights.title: rights
rights.description: This property refers to a statement that specifies rights associated with the Catalogue.

rightsHolder.title: rights holder
rightsHolder.description: This property refers to an organization holding rights on the Catalog.

spatial.title: spatial/geographic coverage
spatial.description: The geographical area covered by the catalog.

temporal.title: temporal coverage
temporal.description: A temporal period that the Catalog covers.

title.title: title
title.description: The title of the catalog in the indicated language

titleMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

homepage.title: homepage
homepage.description: A homepage of the catalog (a public Web document usually available in HTML).

qualifiedAttribution.title: qualified attribution
qualifiedAttribution.description: This property refers to a link to an Agent having some form of responsibility for the Catalog.

value.title: value
value.description: Refers to values computed by metric.

unitMeasure.title: unit of measure
unitMeasure.description: Unit of measure associated with the value

category.title: category
category.description: This property refers to a type of the Agent that makes the Catalog, Catalog Record, Data Service, or Dataset available

name.title: name
name.description: The name of the software agent

status.title: change type
status.description: The status of the catalog record in the context of editorial flow of the dataset and data service descriptions.

conformsTo.title: application profile
conformsTo.description: An Application Profile that the Catalog Record's metadata conforms to.

description.title: description
description.description: A free-text account of the Catalog Record. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the description.

issued.title: listing date
issued.description: The date on which the description of the Dataset was included in the Catalog.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

language.title: language
language.description: A language used in the textual metadata describing titles, descriptions, etc. of the Catalog Record.

modified.title: update/modification date
modified.description: The most recent date on which the Catalog Record's entry was changed or modified.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

source.title: source metadata
source.description: The original metadata that was used in creating metadata for the datasets, data services, or catalogs in the Catalog Record.

title.title: title
title.description: A name given to the Catalog Record.

titleMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

primaryTopic.title: primary topic
primaryTopic.description: A link to the Dataset, Data service or Catalog described in the Catalog Record.

created.title: creation date
created.description: This property contains the date on which the Standard has been first created.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

description.title: description
description.description: This property contains a free-text account of the Standard. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the description

descriptionMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

identifier.title: identifier
identifier.description: This property contains the main identifier for the Standard, e.g. the URI or other unique identifier in the context of the Catalogue, or of a reference register

issued.title: issued
issued.description: This property contains the date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the Standard.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

modified.title: last modified
modified.description: This property contains the most recent date on which the Standard was changed or modified.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

title.title: title
title.description: This property contains a name given to the Standard. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the name

titleMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

category.title: category
category.description: This property refers to the type of the Standard. A controlled vocabulary for the values has not been established.

inScheme.title: in scheme
inScheme.description: This property MAY be used to specify the reference register to which the Standard belongs.

restrictionNote.title: restriction note
restrictionNote.description: Significant information pertaining to the use or reproduction of the data.

restrictionNoteMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

restrictionStatus.title: restriction status
restrictionStatus.description: Indication of whether or not there are use restrictions on the archival materials

specificRestriction.title: specific restriction
specificRestriction.description: The specific NARA restriction associated with the use restriction

contactPoint.title: contact point
contactPoint.description: This property contains contact information that can be used for sending comments about the Dataset Series.

first.title: first
first.description: The first dataset in an ordered dataset series, to which the current dataset belongs.

last.title: last
last.description: The last resource in an ordered dataset series

seriesMember.title: series member
seriesMember.description: A member of the Dataset Series.

accrualPeriodicity.title: frequency
accrualPeriodicity.description: This property refers to the frequency at which the Dataset Series is updated.

description.title: description
description.description: A free-text account of the Dataset Series.

descriptionMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

issued.title: release date
issued.description: The date of formal issuance (e.g.,publication) of the Dataset Series.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

modified.title: update/modification date
modified.description: This property contains the most recent date on which the Dataset Series was changed or modified.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

publisher.title: publisher
publisher.description: An entity (organization) responsible for ensuring the coherency of the Dataset Series.

spatial.title: spatial/geographic coverage
spatial.description: This property refers to a geographic region that is covered by the Dataset Series.

temporal.title: temporal coverage
temporal.description: A temporal period that the Dataset Series covers.

title.title: title
title.description: A name given to the Dataset Series.

titleMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

restrictionNote.title: restriction note
restrictionNote.description: A note related to the access restriction

restrictionNoteMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

restrictionStatus.title: restriction status
restrictionStatus.description: The indication of whether or not there are access restrictions on the data.

specificRestriction.title: specific restriction
specificRestriction.description: The specific NARA restriction associated with the access restriction

country-name.title: country
country-name.description: The country of an Address of the Kind.

locality.title: locality
locality.description: The city of an Address of the Kind.

postal-code.title: postal code
postal-code.description: The postal code of an Address of the Kind.

region.title: administrative area
region.description: The administrative area of an Address of the Kind. Depending on the country, this corresponds to a province, a county, a region, or a state.

street-address.title: street address
street-address.description: The street name and civic number of an Address of the Kind.

sample.title: sample
sample.description: Links to a sample of a Dataset, which is a dcat:Distribution.

status.title: lifecycle status
status.description: The status of the dataset  in the context of maturity lifecycle.

contactPoint.title: contact point
contactPoint.description: This property contains contact information that can be used for sending comments about the Dataset.

distribution.title: dataset distribution
distribution.description: This property links the Dataset to an available Distribution.

first.title: first
first.description: the first item of the sequence the dataset belongs to

hasCurrentVersion.title: current version
hasCurrentVersion.description: reference to the current (latest) version of a dataset

hasVersion.title: has version
hasVersion.description: A related Dataset that is a version, edition, or adaptation of the described Dataset.

inSeries.title: in series
inSeries.description: Dataset Series this dataset belong to

keyword.title: keyword/tag
keyword.description: This property contains a keyword or tag describing the Dataset.

keywordMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

landingPage.title: landing page
landingPage.description: This property refers to a web page that provides access to the Dataset, its Distributions and/or additional information.

qualifiedRelation.title: qualified relation
qualifiedRelation.description: Qualified relationship with role of the dataset with another resource

version.title: version
version.description: The version indicator (name or identifier) of a resource

describedBy.title: data dictionary
describedBy.description: This property refers to a distribution describing the Data Dictionary.

geographicBoundingBox.title: geographic bounding box
geographicBoundingBox.description: WGS84 Geographic Bounding Box for this dataset

liabilityStatement.title: liability statement
liabilityStatement.description: A liability statement about the dataset

purposeMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

accessRights.title: access rights
accessRights.description: Information that indicates whether the Dataset is open data, has access restrictions or is public.

accrualPeriodicity.title: frequency
accrualPeriodicity.description: This property refers to the frequency at which the Dataset is updated.

conformsTo.title: conforms to
conformsTo.description: This property refers to an standard which the described Dataset conforms.

contributor.title: contributor
contributor.description: This property refers to an agent contributing to the Dataset.

created.title: creation date
created.description: This property contains the date on which the Dataset has been first created.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

creator.title: creator
creator.description: This property refers to an entity responsible for producing the dataset.

description.title: description
description.description: This property contains a free-text account of the Dataset.

descriptionMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

hasPart.title: has part
hasPart.description: This property refers to a related dataset that is part of the described dataset.

identifier.title: identifier
identifier.description: This property contains the unique identifier for the Dataset, e.g. the URI or other unique identifier in the context of the Catalog.

isReferencedBy.title: is referenced by
isReferencedBy.description: This property is about a related resource, such as a publication, that references, cites, or otherwise points to the Dataset.

issued.title: release date
issued.description: Date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the dataset.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

language.title: language
language.description: A language used in the Dataset.

modified.title: last modified
modified.description: The most recent date on which the Dataset was changed or modified.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

provenance.title: provenance
provenance.description: A statement about the lineage of a Dataset

publisher.title: publisher
publisher.description: This property refers to an organisation responsible for making the Dataset available.

rights.title: rights
rights.description: A statement that concerns all rights for the Dataset not addressed with dcterms:license or dcterms:accessRights, such as copyright statements.

rightsHolder.title: rights holder
rightsHolder.description: This property refers to an Agent (organization) holding rights on the Dataset.

source.title: data source
source.description: Reference to the source of the dataset

spatial.title: spatial/geographic coverage
spatial.description: This property refers to a geographic region that is covered by the Dataset.

temporal.title: temporal coverage
temporal.description: A temporal period that the dataset  covers.

title.title: title
title.description: This property contains a name given to the Dataset. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the name

titleMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

hasQualityMeasurement.title: quality measurement
hasQualityMeasurement.description: property referring to a quality measurement for the dataset

page.title: documentation
page.description: A page or document about this dataset

qualifiedAttribution.title: qualified attribution
qualifiedAttribution.description: An agent having some form of responsibility for the dataset

wasGeneratedBy.title: was generated by
wasGeneratedBy.description: An activity that generated, or provides the business context for, the creation of the dataset

wasUsedBy.title: used by
wasUsedBy.description: This property refers to an Activity that used the Dataset

image.title: image
image.description: A thumbnail picture illustrating the content of the dataset.

scopeNoteMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

label.title: provenance statement text
label.description: This property contains the text of the Provenance Statement. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the name

labelMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

address.title: address
address.description: This property specifies the address of the contact

hasEmail.title: email
hasEmail.description: The email address of the contact

family-name.title: family name
family-name.description: This property specifies the family name of the person to contact

fn.title: formatted name
fn.description: The formatted text corresponding to the name of the contact

given-name.title: given name
given-name.description: This property specifies the given name of the person to contact

organization-name.title: organization name
organization-name.description: This property specifies the name of the organization to contact

tel.title: telephone
tel.description: This property specifies the telephone number for telephony communication with the person or organization.

title.title: position title
title.description: This property specifies the position role of the person to contact

bbox.title: bounding box
bbox.description: bounding box associated location (in any coordinate system)

oneOf.description: This can be one of the following:

centroid.title: centroid
centroid.description: The geographic center (centroid) of a spatial thing

identifier.description: This property contains the geographic identifier for the Location, e.g., the URI or other unique identifier in the context of the relevant gazetteer.

label.description: Full text of the liability statement

altLabel.description: alternative names (trading names, colloquial names) for an organization

prefLabel.title: preferred label
prefLabel.description: Preferred or legal name of the organization

endDate.description: The end date of the period of time

familyName.title: family name
familyName.description: The family name of the Person

givenName.title: given name
givenName.description: The given name of the Person

name.title: name
name.description: The full name of the Person

memberOf.title: member of
memberOf.description: This property MAY be used to specify the affiliation of the Person to an organization.

attributionText.title: attribution text
attributionText.description: The custom attribution text for the right statement

attributionTextMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

representationTechnique.title: representation technique
representationTechnique.description: This property MAY be used to provide more information about the format in which an Distribution is released. This is different from the file format as, for example, a ZIP file (file format) could contain an XML schema (representation technique). In DCAT-US profile,  this property SHOULD be used to express the spatial representation type (grid, vector, tin), by using the URIs of the corresponding code list operated by an approved registry.

status.title: lifecycle status
status.description: The status of the distribution in the context of maturity lifecycle.

characterEncoding.title: character encoding
characterEncoding.description: This property SHOULD be used to specify the character encoding of the Distribution, by using as value the character set names in the IANA register

accessService.title: access service
accessService.description: A data service that gives access to the distribution of the dataset.

accessURL.title: access URL
accessURL.description: A URL that gives access to a Distribution of the Dataset.

byteSize.title: byte size
byteSize.description: The size of a Distribution in bytes.

compressFormat.title: compression format
compressFormat.description: The format of the file in which the data is contained in a compressed form, e.g. to reduce the size of the downloadable file

downloadURL.title: download URL
downloadURL.description: A URL that is a direct link to a downloadable file in a given format.

mediaType.title: media type
mediaType.description: The media type of the Distribution as defined in the official register of media types managed by IANA.

packageFormat.title: packaging format
packageFormat.description: The format of the file in which one or more data files are grouped together, e.g. to enable a set of related files to be downloaded together.

spatialResolutionInMeters.title: Spatial resolution (meters)
spatialResolutionInMeters.description: The minimum spatial separation resolvable in a dataset distribution, measured in meters.

temporalResolution.title: termporal resolution
temporalResolution.description: The minimum time period resolvable in the dataset distribution.

availability.title: availability
availability.description: An indication how long it is planned to keep the Distribution of the Dataset available.

accessRestriction.title: access restriction
accessRestriction.description: Access restriction related to the distribution

cuiRestriction.title: CUI restriction
cuiRestriction.description: Controlled Unclassified Information restriction related to the distribution

describedBy.title: data dictionary
describedBy.description: This property refers to a distribution describing the Data Dictionary.

useRestriction.title: use restriction
useRestriction.description: Use restriction related to the distribution

accessRights.title: access rights
accessRights.description: This property MAY include information regarding access or restrictions based on privacy, security, or other policies.

conformsTo.title: linked schemas
conformsTo.description: This property refers to an established schema or reference systems which the described Distribution conforms.

description.title: description
description.description: A free-text account of the Distribution.

descriptionMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

format.title: format
format.description: The file format of the Distribution.

identifier.title: identifier
identifier.description: This property contains a unique identifier for the Distribution (e.g. DOI, ISBN)

issued.title: release date
issued.description: The date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the Distribution.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

language.title: language
language.description: A language used in the Distribution.

license.title: license
license.description: A licence under which the Distribution is made available.

modified.title: last modified
modified.description: The most recent date on which the Distribution was changed or modified.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

rights.title: rights
rights.description: A statement that specifies rights associated with the Distribution.

title.title: title
title.description: A name given to the Distribution.

titleMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

hasQualityMeasurement.title: quality measurement
hasQualityMeasurement.description: property referring to a quality measurement for the distribution

page.title: documentation
page.description: A page or document about this Distribution.

image.title: image
image.description: A thumbnail picture illustrating the content of the distribution

checksum.title: checksum
checksum.description: A mechanism that can be used to verify that the contents of a distribution have not changed.

altLabelMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

definition.title: definition
definition.description: Definition of the controlled vocabulary term.

definitionMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

notation.title: notation
notation.description: abbreviations or codes from code lists for an organization.

prefLabel.title: preferred label
prefLabel.description: Preferred label for the controlled vocabulary term (one per language).

prefLabelMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

algorithm.title: algorithm
algorithm.description: The algorithm used to produce the subject Checksum.

checksumValue.title: checksum value
checksumValue.description: A lower case hexadecimal encoded digest value produced using a specific algorithm.

label.title: label
label.description: This property contains the denomination of the Media Type.

labelMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

schemaAgency.title: schema agency
schemaAgency.description: The name of the agency that issued the identifier.

creator.title: creator
creator.description: the agency that manages the identifier scheme

issued.title: issued
issued.description: The date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the Identiifer.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

notation.title: notation
notation.description: abbreviations or codes from code lists for an identifier

contactPoint.title: contact point
contactPoint.description: This property contains contact information that can be used for sending comments about the Data Service.

endpointDescription.title: endpoint description
endpointDescription.description: A description of the services available via the end-points, including their operations, parameters etc.

endpointURL.title: endpoint URL
endpointURL.description: The root location or primary endpoint of the service (a Web-resolvable IRI)

keyword.title: keyword/tag
keyword.description: This property contains a keyword or tag describing the Data Service.

keywordMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

servesDataset.title: serves dataset
servesDataset.description: The Dataset that is served by this data service.

spatialResolutionInMeters.title: spatial resolution in meters
spatialResolutionInMeters.description: This property refers to the minimum spatial separation resolvable in a Data Service, measured in meters.

temporalResolution.title: temporal resolution
temporalResolution.description: The minimum time period resolvable by the Data Service.

theme.title: theme/category
theme.description: This property refers to a theme of the Data Service. A Data Service may be associated with multiple themes.

geographicBoundingBox.title: geographic bounding box
geographicBoundingBox.description: This property describes the spatial extent of domain of application of an data service and is standardized in WGS 84 Lat/Long coordinate system.

accessRights.title: access rights
accessRights.description: This property MAY include information regarding access or restrictions based on privacy, security, or other policies.

conformsTo.title: conforms to
conformsTo.description: This property is used to indicate the general standard or specification that the Data Service endpoints implement.

created.title: creation date
created.description: This property contains the date on which the Data Service has been first created.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

creator.title: creator
creator.description: This property refers to the Agent primarily responsible for producing the Data Service.

description.title: description
description.description: This property contains a free-text account of the Data Service.

descriptionMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

identifier.title: identifier
identifier.description: This property contains the main identifier for the Data Service, e.g. the URI or other unique identifier in the context of the Catalog.

language.title: language
language.description: This property refers to a language supported by the Data Service. This property can be repeated if multiple languages are supported in the Data Service.

license.title: license
license.description: This property refers to the license under which the Data Service is made available.

modified.title: update/modification date
modified.description: This property contains the most recent date on which the Data Service was changed or modified.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

publisher.title: publisher
publisher.description: This property refers to an entity (organization) responsible for making the Data Service available.

rights.title: rights
rights.description: A statement that concerns all rights for the Data Service not addressed with dcterms:license or dcterms:accessRights, such as copyright statements.

rightsHolder.title: rights holder
rightsHolder.description: This property refers to an Agent (organization) holding rights on the Data Service.

spatial.title: spatial/geographic coverage
spatial.description: This property refers to a geographic region that is covered by the Data Service.

temporal.title: temporal coverage
temporal.description: A temporal period that the DataService covers.

title.title: title
title.description: The title of the data service in the indicated language

titleMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

hasQualityMeasurement.title: quality measurement
hasQualityMeasurement.description: Refers to the performed quality measurements.

hasPolicy.title: has policy
hasPolicy.description: An ODRL conformant policy expressing the rights associated with the Data Service.

qualifiedAttribution.title: qualified attribution
qualifiedAttribution.description: This property refers to a link to an Agent having some form of responsibility for the DataService.

wasUsedBy.title: was used by
wasUsedBy.description: This property refers to an Activity that used the Data Service.

expectedDataType.title: expected datatype
expectedDataType.description: Represents the expected data type for the metric's observed value (e.g., xsd:boolean, xsd:double etc...)

inDimension.title: in dimension
inDimension.description: Represents the dimensions a quality metric, certificate and annotation allow a measurement of.

cuiBannerMarking.title: CUI banner marking
cuiBannerMarking.description: CUI (Controlled Unclassified Information) banner marking is required for any unclassified information that is deemed sensitive and requires protection.

designationIndicator.title: CUI designation indicator
designationIndicator.description: Designation Indicator shows which agency made the document CUI

requiredIndicatorPerAuthority.title: required indicator per authority
requiredIndicatorPerAuthority.description: free text (e.g., text of the category description or the distribution statement)

eastBoundingLongitude.title: east bounding longitude
eastBoundingLongitude.description: East bound longitude in decimal degrees

northBoundingLatitude.title: north bounding latitude
northBoundingLatitude.description: North bound latitude in decimal degrees

southBoundingLatitude.title: south bouding latitude
southBoundingLatitude.description: South bound latitude in decimal degrees

westBoundingLongitude.title: west bounding longitude
westBoundingLongitude.description: West bound longitude in decimal degrees

hadRole.title: role
hadRole.description: The function of an entity or agent with respect to another entity or resource.

agent.title: agent
agent.description: The agent property references an Agent that plays a role in the resource

label.title: label
label.description: This property is used to give a human-readable label for the activity.

labelMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

creators.title: author(s) as literal
creators.description: list of authors as a literal

publishers.title: publisher(s) as literal
publishers.description: list of publishers as a literal

mediaType.title: media type
mediaType.description: The file format of the Document.

abstractMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

conformsTo.title: conforms to standard
conformsTo.description: This property refers to an standard which the described Document conforms.

creator.title: corporate author
creator.description: The organization responsible for creating the resource.

description.title: description
description.description: A free-text account of the Document

descriptionMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

identifier.title: identifier
identifier.description: This property contains a unique identifier for the Document (e.g. DOI, ISBN)

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

title.title: title
title.description: The title of the document in the indicated language

titleMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

hadRole.title: role
hadRole.description: The function of an entity or agent with respect to another entity or resource.

relation.title: relation
relation.description: The resource related to the source resource.

version.title: version info
version.description: This property contains a version number or other version designation of the Concept Scheme.

created.title: creation date
created.description: This property contains the date on which the Concept Scheme has been first created.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

description.title: description
description.description: This property contains a description of the Concept Scheme.

descriptionMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}

issued.title: publication date
issued.description: This property contains the date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the Concept Scheme.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

modified.title: update/modification date
modified.description: This property contains the most recent date at which the Concept Scheme was changed or modified.

oneOf.description: A year and month in YYYY-MM format

title.title: title
title.description: The title of the concept scheme in the indicated language.

titleMap.description: Language map for property title. E.g. {'es': 'spanish words', 'fr': 'french words'}
